Package org.forgerock.openig.audit

Contains the audit framework APIs.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    AuditEventListener
    An AuditEventListener defines a listener interface for implementing AuditEvent observers.
    AuditSystem
    An AuditSystem is an OpenIG service that helps to decouple AuditEvent producers and consumers.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AuditEvent
    An AuditEvent represents a point in time during the processing of an Exchange.
    AuditSource
    An AuditSource provides information about the AuditEvent source object (emitter).
    ConditionalAuditEventListener
    A ConditionalAuditEventListener is conditionally invoked AuditEventListener.
    ConditionalAuditEventListener.ConditionalListenerHeaplet
    Creates and initializes a ConditionalListenerHeaplet in a heap environment.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    Tag
    Static list of standard tags used in audit decorators.

Package org.forgerock.openig.audit Description

Contains the audit framework APIs.
